body_html:
@meteorcloudy This problem was solved by running pacman -Syu perl' as @maccam912 suggested AND after uninstalling Windows active Perl.

Now build failes with:
ERROR: D:/tf/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/build/grpc/src/grpc/BUILD:159:1: no such target '//external:libssl': target 'libssl' not declared in package 'external' defined by D:/tf/tensorflow/WORKSPACE and referenced by '//tensorflow/contrib/cmake/build/grpc/src/grpc:grpc'.
ERROR: D:/tf/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/build/grpc/src/grpc/BUILD:159:1: no such target '//external:libssl': target 'libssl' not declared in package 'external' defined by D:/tf/tensorflow/WORKSPACE and referenced by '//tensorflow/contrib/cmake/build/grpc/src/grpc:grpc'.
ERROR: Evaluation of query "deps((//tensorflow/... union @bazel_tools//tools/jdk:toolchain))" failed: errors were encountered while computing transitive closure.

Looks like that is an other issue.

body:
@meteorcloudy  This problem was solved by running **pacman -Syu perl'** as  @maccam912  suggested AND after uninstalling Windows active Perl.

Now build failes with:
ERROR: D:/tf/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/build/grpc/src/grpc/BUILD:159:1: no such target '//external:libssl': target 'libssl' not declared in package 'external' defined by D:/tf/tensorflow/WORKSPACE and referenced by '//tensorflow/contrib/cmake/build/grpc/src/grpc:grpc'.
ERROR: D:/tf/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/build/grpc/src/grpc/BUILD:159:1: no such target '//external:libssl': target 'libssl' not declared in package 'external' defined by D:/tf/tensorflow/WORKSPACE and referenced by '//tensorflow/contrib/cmake/build/grpc/src/grpc:grpc'.
ERROR: Evaluation of query "deps((//tensorflow/... union @bazel_tools//tools/jdk:toolchain))" failed: errors were encountered while computing transitive closure.

Looks like that is an other issue.
